name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course is designed to equip students with the necessary English communication skills in the workplace. The content will include English resume writing, business English, English interviews, briefing skills, and office English conversation. This course will also strengthen students’ basic English skills, such as vocabulary, grammar, and writing.
